data.title: Storyville Records Denmark?
data.meta_description: Hi Buds & Budettes- anyone heard the vinyl reissues from Storyville Records in Denmark? If so, thoughts about the quality? Wondering specifically about...
data.text:
Hi Buds & Budettes- anyone heard the vinyl reissues from Storyville Records in Denmark? If so, thoughts about the quality? Wondering specifically about Webster Plays Ballads.

It's here: Ben Webster Plays Ballads - Remastered - Storyville Records - The Best in Jazz since 1952

Any input is greatly appreciated!

Another bump. I'm curious as well.

The language on the web site ("The audio has been remastered specifically for vinyl") suggests to me that these were cut from digital (hopefully hi-res), but with no info on who mastered them or where they were pressed (nothing on Discogs either), I'm hesitant to take the plunge.

Whole series:

Big Bill Broonzy / An Evening With Big Bill Broonzy

Magic Slim / Born On A Bad Sign

Sonny Boy Williamson II / The Blues Of Sonny Boy Williamson

Archie Shepp & John Tchicai / Archie Shepp & The New York Contemporary Five

Bud Powell & Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen (NHØP) / Bouncing With Bud

Ben Webster / Ben Webster Plays Ballads

Sahib Shihab / Sentiments

Charlie Parker / Charlie Parker In Sweden 1950
